<title level="1" right="Trait">[Lizardfolk](/Traits.aspx?ID=226)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

These reptilian [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91), also known as iruxi, are extremely adaptable and patient.
